name: Light The Lantern
description:
Instruction:

You have to collect all the lights and get to the lantern and complete the level.

Controls:

Moving: A and D/Left and right arrow keys

Jumping: Space bar/Shift/W/Up arrow key

Restart level: R

Return to Level selection: Esc

Credits:

Made by ntb896, with a little help of my friend mnhat with the graphics.

Feel free to leave any feedback in the comment.
